Key Match Events: Ben Stokes scored 42 runs to guide England to a 4-wicket win with 2 balls remaining
Pathum Nissanka scored 67 runs for Sri Lanka
Post-Match Reflections: England are through to the semi-finals of the T20 World Cup
Sri Lanka's defeat eliminates Australia from the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: England became the first team to win at the SCG when chasing in the T20 World Cup
Others: Adil Rashid took the wicket of Pathum Nissanka
Mark Wood took 3 wickets for 26 runs
